gitCommit.subject: Disable local testing - CI/CD only
gitCommit.body:
Disable local testing - CI/CD only

Removed all local testing capabilities to ensure tests only run in the controlled CI/CD environment.

Changes:
- Updated CLAUDE.md to remove local testing instructions
- Clarified that all tests run exclusively in CI/CD pipeline
- Disabled Playwright local webServer configuration
- Updated test dashboard documentation to point to deployed URLs
- Removed instructions for running tests locally

Testing workflow:
- Push to preview branch â†’ Vercel deploys â†’ CI runs tests
- View results at /tests dashboard on deployed site
- Tests pass â†’ auto-merge to main â†’ production deployment

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
